description: Developed scalable, hierarchical, housing-constrained cohort-component and logarithmic models to forecast Singapore’s resident and non-resident populations, with exogenous features forecasted separately using statsforecast, to support long-term healthcare demand and resource planning within NUHS cluster.

Designed and implemented a cluster-based hierarchical GAM model for hospital bed occupancy forecasting, enabling multi-level forecasts to support long-term hospital resource planning, budgeting, and patient care strategies.

Designed and implemented ETL pipelines to clean, transform, and store datasets, enabling fast and reliable data retrieval and analysis for stakeholder requests to support resource allocation, capacity planning, and other development efforts.

Performed time series analysis by clustering similar patterns with K-Means, extracting statistical features using tsfeatures, and applying ANOVA to identify key differentiators - enabling the development of a rule-based classification pipeline that labelled forecasts by business relevance (e.g., “Discontinued”, “Highly Volatile”), improving stakeholder interpretability and decision-making.

Developed and deployed a rule-based classification pipeline that uses features identified with tsfeatures to classify time series forecasts by materiality, volatility, and accuracy into intuitive labels (e.g., “Discontinued”, “Highly Volatile”), improving stakeholder interpretability and decision-making.
Incorporated machine learning models using mlforecast, improving forecasting accuracy by ~70% for targeted time series previously forecasted with statistical and econometric models.
Utilized Git for version control, ensuring reproducibility and smooth team collaboration.

Designed and deployed a Dockerized Flask web application with Zoho REST APIs and SQLite backend, delivering a real-time KPI monitoring dashboard, reducing data-gathering for HR and management from one week to an hourly update.
Utilized Git for version control, ensuring reproducibility and smooth team collaboration.
